import React from "react"; import Fade from "react-reveal/Fade"; import ApplicationComponent from "../../common/applicationComponent"; class HostingBanner extends ApplicationComponent { render() { const { detailText, startButtonText, titleText } = this.label.landingPage.banner; return (

{titleText}

{detailText}

{startButtonText}
); } } export default HostingBanner;
